snippet: Forensics experts hired by Sony Corp to investigate the massive cyber attack at its Hollywood studio said the breach was unprecedented, well-planned and carried out by an "organized group," according to an email obtained by Reuters on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Sony Investigator Says Cyber Attack 'Unparalleled' Crime
headline.main: Sony Investigator Says Cyber Attack 'Unparalleled' Crime

lead_paragraph: Forensics experts hired by Sony Corp to investigate the massive cyber attack at its Hollywood studio said the breach was unprecedented, well-planned and carried out by an "organized group," according to an email obtained by Reuters on Saturday.
